Title:
Do Developers Introduce Bugs when they do not Communicate?
The Case of Eclipse and Mozilla
Published: European Conference on Software Maintenance and Reengineering
Elements_risk_assessment:
the annotate option of CVS is used to identify for each source line
in f i changed to fix the bug k, the file revision where the last change to that line occurred
UseOF-SZZ: by identifying committers likely responsible of bug-introducing changes
Summary:
how the level of communication between committers relates to their proneness to introduce
faults.
Outcome: bug-introducing committers have a higher social importance than other committers
